utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: May I come in?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, yeah, if you want too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you want me too?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, sure?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So do I. Okay Rach, before anything happens I just want to lay down a couple of ground rules. This is just about tonight. I don't to go through with this if it's going to raise the question of "Us." Okay? I just want this to be about what it is!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And um, what-what is that Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The physical act of love.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! Are you crazy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh so-so you weren't trying to entice me just now with your-your nakedness?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God, you saw me?! Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You weren't trying to entice me with your nakedness.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo!! No! You thought, you actually thought I wanted to have sex with you?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No! No! No-no-no-no.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh wow! I’m sorry, but Ross you kicked off your shoes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Can we, can we just forget this ever happened?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes of course, absolutely! You're right. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right I guess I'm, gonna go pack.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Oh wait! One more thing umm, do-do we still need to uh settle the question of "us?"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys wait! Guys! This place is so much better than London! Okay? This lady dressed like Cleopatra gave me a coupon, 99 cent steak and lobster dinner. Huh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, you don't eat animals.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: For 99 cents, I'd eat you. Okay, I can totally settle down here. It's got everything I could ever want, including Joey! Look! Oh! Look! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Joey! Hey! Hey!! Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Love your condoms my man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What-what are you guys doing here? I thought I told you not to come.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why are you dressed as a gladiator?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, because I'm shooting a scene right now. Yeah, I uh, I play a gladiator. Uh, y'know what? Hold-hold on a second. Can we cut? Yeah, my-my friends are here, I'm gonna take a little break.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who are you talking too?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They uh director. Uhh, her. All right, all right, it's not a gladiator movie. I work here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?! What happened?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, the movie got shutdown because they ran out of money, so I'm working here 'til it starts up again, if it ever does.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I'm sorry I didn't tell ya. I'm sorry man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no, that's okay, apparently there's a new policy where we don't have to share everything with everybody.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I knew you were not okay with that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you're a gladiator! Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, what-what's going on?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica had lunch with Richard.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dawson?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Noo! But that would've been so cool!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! Her boyfriend Richard!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It meant nothing! Okay? After all this time, how can you not trust me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When you go lunching with hunky moustache men and don't tell me about it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're right. I'm sorry. I should've told you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Aww, there we go.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I love Vegas!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I promise you, next time I will absolutely tell you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Next time?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, so close.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: There's not gonna be a next time! You can not ever see him again!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can not see him? I mean, you can't tell me what to do!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's so funny, because I think I just did!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh y'know what? If you're gonna be acting like this all night, I really, I don't even want to be around you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine with me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine! Happy Anniversary!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa! Guys! Please! Come on! Come on! This is obviously just a big misunderstanding.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No it is not!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you talking…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey don't look at me! I just work here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay umm, Ross? I'm-I'm really warm, so I'm going to be taking off my sweater. Now, I'm just letting you know that this is not an invitation to the physical act of love.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yep! That's hilarious!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry. I'm done. I'm done.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know, last night was embarrassing for you too.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, not really. I mean you've seen me naked hundreds of times.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh. But it was a first for the rest of my building.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. All right, that's true! But y'know I just don't embarrass that easily.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! You totally get embarrassed!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I don't! Ross, I think I'm just a more secure person than you are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that so?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey lady! I don't care how much you want it! Okay?! I am not gonna to have sex with you in the bathroom!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, y'know in Roman times this was more than just a hat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, sure! Sure! They would uh, they would scrub the floors with it! They would use it to get the mud off their shoe. And sometimes underneath the horse would get dirty so they would stick it right…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey, I uh! I can't believe this is how I'm spending my anniversary.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right well, I'll take you someplace nice then. Look! A guy tipped me a hundred bucks today.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, he was playing blackjack for like an hour and he won $5,000. Can you believe that? $5,000!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, if I won $5,000 I'd join a gym, y'know build up my upper body and hit Richard from behind with a stick!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait a minute! Why don't I do what that guy did? I'll take this $100 and turn it into $5,000! And then I'll turn that into enough money to get my movie going again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Good luck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler! I don't need luck. I have thought this through!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe this! This is like the worst night ever!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Y'know Monica you had a minor setback in your relationship with Chandler. Big deal! It's only Chandler. I am so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is crazy! I mean, it's such a stupid argument. I don't even wanna see Richard again.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So go fix it! Go find Chandler! He's probably up in your room! Tell him that you're sorry and that you love him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what? You're right Phoebe. You're right. Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sure! Yeah! Las Vegas, number one!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Anybody lose this?

utterance.speaker: The Croupier
utterance.content: Comin' out. Place your bet. Dice are out. Double or nothin'! Pay the front line!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hmm.

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: So uh, I'm on my way back to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, all right. All right! Just keep walkin'! All right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross! What are you… I'm sorry sir. I just, I think he just really likes you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey! Y'know that teacher who had a baby with her student?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What the? What…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: The Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Miss? May I help you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I'm sorry. Do you have any extra pants? Umm, my friend seems to have had a little accident.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Can I change a hundred?

utterance.speaker: Blackjack Dealer
utterance.content: Changing one hundred! Good luck sir.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Let's ride.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hit me! Ohh man! Wait!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler! You are not gonna believe this! I have found my identical hand twin!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My identical hand twin!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's an identical hand twin?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's it sound like? It's a guy with my identical hands! It was incredible! Chandler, the dealer's hands were exactly like me! It-it was like looking at my hands in a mirror!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you sure you weren't looking at your hands in a mirror?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t you see what this means?! I can forget about that stupid movie. I'm gonna be a millionaire!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I don't have it all worked out yet, but it's gotta mean big money! Come on! Identical hands!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Again I must go back to, how?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This is Vegas man! People will pay to see freaky stuff! Okay, how much would you pay to see this hand twice? Huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, I-I can't really put a price on that Joe.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, are you unsupporting me again?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No! I support you 100%! I just didn't, I didn't get it right away. Y'know now I'm caught up! Identical hand twins! It's a million-dollar idea!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pheebs!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I found my identical hand twin!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, you are so lucky! Hey! So, where's Monica? Did you guys make up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But she just came up here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That was Joey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wonder where she is. That is so weird.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, well, she's probably talking to Richard.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Would you stop that! Do you wanna know the first thing she said when she came back from her lunch with Richard? She didn't feel anything for him. She loves you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes! Now, she feels terrible! She really wants to make up! You gotta find her.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Good. I should really start wearing hats!

utterance.speaker: The Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Welcome to Las Vegas.

utterance.speaker: The Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Thank you! Enjoy your flight?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes, I did. Thank you very much, it was excellent.

utterance.speaker: The Flight Attendant
utterance.content: Hope you had a nice flight.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, it was the best!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think the check in is that way.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello! Ohh, kids love me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys are here! Yay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? Did you go to a costume party? Let me guess umm Pancho Vila? and you're Bob Saget.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Pancho Vila?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What are you talking about Pheebs? I don't… Oh my God, you drew on me?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you wet my pants!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whoa, what kind of party was this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I have been walking around like this since the plane! I can—you have so crossed a line.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach! Wait! The men's room is that way.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's like the third time that lady's won on a machine I was playing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oooohhh, I'll bet she's one of those people.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: M-M-Mole people?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? No-no, a lurker.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. What's a lurker?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay when you're playing a machine and it hasn't paid out, a lurker waits for you to give up and then…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Kills you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. They swoop in and steal your jackpot.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohhh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How do you know about this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My nana used to do it. That's how she paid for all my dance—karate lessons.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Dance karate?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, it's a deadly but beautiful sport.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right, it won't come off!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It won't come off!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! Rach-Rach, are-are-are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, actually I took it off then I drew it back on.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey you made it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! Hey-hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who's your friend? He's hot!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks man.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey listen I uh, talked to Chandler, sorry about the movie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, don't be sorry. I don't need it anymore. I found my identical hand twin!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My identical hand twin! The person whose hands are exactly like mine! This thing is a gold mine!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! That's not gonna make you any money!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Well, if that's how you feel about it, fine! None of you get to live with me in my great big hand-shaped mansion! Except uh, you Pheebs. You can live in the thumb.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right baby, come on! Yes! Yes! I am on fire!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See you later Mon.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wait Chandler, what are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What does it look like? I'm going home.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? Wait! Why? Chandler! Chandler! Wait! I’m sorry, I was just playing for one second! I was trying to find you to tell you that, look if you don't want me to see Richard again, I won't! He means nothing to me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on! I was there! I know he's the love of your life.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not any more.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really! All right? Let's forget about this going home stuff and celebrate our anniversary. Okay, this is empty.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I wanted to make a dramatic scene, but I hate packing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, hey. Where's the other guy?

utterance.speaker: The Woman Dealer
utterance.content: Which guy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: He's kinda tall, dark hair, hand looks exactly like this. See?

utterance.speaker: The Woman Dealer
utterance.content: I don't know about the hands, but the guy that was here before me just went to the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay! How you doin'?

utterance.speaker: The Woman Dealer
utterance.content: Very busy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right! Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, hello. I have a question. Umm, I used your pen to draw on my friend's face. A beard and a moustache. Thank you. No, she didn't think so. I know it's like anyway, umm well make-up didn't cover it and we've tried everything to get it off and nothing's worked. What-what do we do? Yeah. Uh-huh. Yeah. Oh! Okay. Okay, thank you! Yeah, it's not coming off.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! What else did he say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, he said he thought I was funny. So… Okay, look-look umm, let's just go downstairs, we'll have some fun, and you will forget all about it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, no! There is no way I am leaving this room looking like this!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, come on! Rach, it's-it's not that bad.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, I am a human doodle!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, just because some idiot drew on your face doesn't mean you shouldn't have any fun! Okay? And besides, hey-hey-hey no one is even gonna look at you. Okay? This is Vegas! Hello! There are tons of other freaks here! There are tons…of…freaks here. No other. No. Come on! No one will notice, I swear!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, there was some staring and pointing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, I need a, I need a drink!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hey y'know, they-they really overcharge you for that stuff. But who cares?! Because it's all on me! That is, one big drink!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Macadamia nut?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm… Wow! That's-that's some pricey nut!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hm-mmm!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really like those Macadamia nuts, huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Nope!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Get out of here you lurker! Go on! Get!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh! You made up!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I couldn't be mad at him for too long.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, she couldn't live without the Chan Love.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, get a room.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We have one.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know. Use it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-oh-oh, yeah! That's right, you take good care of those babies!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's me, Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, so what are we going to do about this hand twin thing?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, you and I have been given a gift. Okay? We have to do something with it. Like-like, hand modeling! Huh? Or-or magic! And you know NASA's gonna wanna talk to us!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa! Whoa-whoa! We could have our own show! Y'know we could clap our hands together people will love it! Huh? And-and-and I wrote a song for us! This hand is your hand! This hand is my hand! Oh wait, that's your hand! No wait, it's my hand!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But you haven't even heard the chorus!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, I'm starting to look like my great aunt, Muriel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right. Y'know what? We don’t have to go downstairs! We can bring Vegas up to us! All right, come on, come on, we'll play some blackjack. Here we go. 13.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oohh, 23. Which is what we play to at this casino! You win 10 dollars!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're right!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: A new pair of shoes for the Chan-Chan man! Yes!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! I've-I've never seen a roll like this in my life!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's right baby! Okay, what do I want now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, ah umm, ah, a 8. Ah, a 6?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Pick a number! That is your only job!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If you get this one, we buy everybody here a steak dinner!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Yay!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We're not really gonna buy these people steak dinners are we?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Noo!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, good! Okay, what do I want now?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ahh, ooh, try a hard 8.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Two fours.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.content: Don't you let her go! You're a lucky guy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you, Mister Drunken Gambler! Okay, you get this and uh, we get the biggest suite in the place! Wait-wait-wait-wait! We get the biggest suite in the place.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, biggest suite in the place. Come on!

utterance.content: Yes!! I love you! I can't even remember what we were fighting about!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, that's because I had lunch with Rich—Me neither! Okay, what do I want now?

utterance.content: Hard 8?! We should call it easy 8!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, okay, I tell you what. You roll another hard eight; and we get married here tonight.

utterance.speaker: Drunken Gambler
utterance.content: Go! Come on! Roll!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Roll-roll!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Shut up!! It just got interesting!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What did you just say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You roll another hard eight and we get married here tonight.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you serious?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! I love you! I've never loved anybody as much as I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I've never loved anybody as much as I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, so if an eight comes up, we take it as a sign and we do it! {Whoa! Where have I heard that before? Matthew Perry talking about signs in Las Vegas. I guess it must've been some movie I saw.} What do you say?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Come on! Let's go! All right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! That's a four! And where-where's the other one?

utterance.speaker: Drunken Gambler
utterance.content: It went under the table.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nobody move! Okay, you look that way; I'll look this way!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here it is! Here it is!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That could be a four or a five. It's your call.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's a four.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think so too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh well, lost again. That's it! You and me, outside!

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: I don't want to see you lose a chunk of that pretty blond hair!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Be cool! Okay lady, your lurking days are over!

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, from now on everyone you lurk, I'm gonna lurk first! You move on to someone else, I'm gonna be one step ahead of you, every single time! And then I'll be on your ass every hour of every day 'til Monday, because that's when I go home. When do you leave?

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: Also Monday.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What time? Maybe we can share a cab!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hit me. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We need more cards.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and also we need more umm, drinks. Hold on a second. Whup, okay. Hello! Vegas? Yeah, we would like some more alcohol, and y'know what else? We would like some more beers. Hello? Ohh, I forgot to dial!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That must be our alcohol and beers!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, it's Joey! I love Joey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, I love Joey! Joey lives with a duck!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look-look-look you guys, I need some help! Okay? Someone is going to have to convince my hand twin to cooperate!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll do it. Hey, whatever you need me to do, I'm your man. Whoa-oh-whoa! Are you, are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! I'm fine! Thanks! Hey Rach, how you doin'?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm doin' good, baby. How you doin'?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, don't let her drink anymore!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, here's that Macadamia nut!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhh!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nope! Something else.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oops! All right, so what do you want to do now?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wanna get out of the room! Y'know, I…I really miss downstairs.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what? There's only one way I'm leaving this hotel room.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well hello! I'm Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Good luck to ya!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Excuse me sir, you've got a little something right here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Ross and Rachel
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I won! I won! I finally won!

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: I won! That was my quarter!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine! Here! Take a hike toots!

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: Excuse me, sir! This lady played my quarter, this is my money.

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: Is that true miss?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sells drugs to kids.

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She sells drugs to kids.

utterance.speaker: The Lurker
utterance.content: It was my quarter!

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: Was it her quarter?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: How about we talk about this over dinner?

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: Okay lady, you're out of here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No, you can't arrest me! No!! I won't go back! I won't go back to that hell hole!!

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: I'm just taking you outside!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, come on, I can't get married until I get something old, something new, something borrowed, and something blue.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, all right, all right, all right! Okay! Okay, here's something, here's something blue and new.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're so efficient. I love you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let's go!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No-no-no! We need something old!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh, great, I have condom in my wallet I've had since I was twelve.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That'll work!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't think so.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, now we just need something borrowed!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here just…take this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's stealing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, we'll-we'll bring it back! Just put it under your dress.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, one thing at a time.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ahhh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, I don't really have any money. Not yet, anyway…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh-ho-ho!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hello. My name is Regina Phalange. I'm a businesswoman in town on business. Would you like to see my card? Ooh, what did I do with my file-a-facts? I must've left it in conference room B.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hit me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! May I just say that you two gentlemen have the exact same hands! They're identical! Now, I've never seen anything like that in the business world.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, Ms. Phalange, may I ask you a question as an impartial person at-at this table?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wouldn't you pay good money to see these identical hands showcased in some type of a uh, entertainment venue?

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: Didn't I just throw you out of here?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, you threw out Phoebe. I'm Ms. Regina Phalange. Phalange!

utterance.speaker: The Security Guard
utterance.content: Come on, lady!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me?! Oh come on, man! You can't do this! Come on! I'm your hand twin!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello! One marriage please!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yep, we wanna get married!

utterance.speaker: The Attendant
utterance.content: Well, there's a service in progress. Have a seat.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Monica
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dum! Dum-dum-dum! Dum! Dum! Dum! Dum-dum-dum!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, that's The Wedding March. Does, does that freak you out?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, only because that's the graduation song.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! This is it! We're gonna get married!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you sure you wanna do this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, hello, Mrs. Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, hello, Mr. Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait! Okay!
